name: market for building machine | building machine | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5224/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'building machine', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This is a mobile infrastructure, representing the product of a building machine, a fictitious machine made 100% of steel. The product is based on an average of different building machines. It has an average service life of 10,000 hours and a lifetime of 20 years. The production includes the building materials, machinery and energy consumption for the manufacturing of the machine.                    

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'building machine',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'building machine',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
